references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a large language model crucial for the visual retrievers used in the benchmark experiments.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: This paper describes Qwen-VL, a vision-language model utilized in multiple visual retrieval methods and is central to the benchmark's multi-modal aspects.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper details PaliGemma, another key vision-language model utilized in several of the benchmark's visual retrieval models.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces DPR, a highly influential dense passage retrieval technique that serves as a foundational method for many of the text-based retrieval models evaluated.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper presents ColBERT, a significant and efficient method for passage search, serving as a basis for multiple evaluated text retrieval models.
